title: Colegas
overview: Colegas is a series produced by Hill Valley, RTVE's digital content platform, premiered on February 13, 2018 and has six chapters. It tells the story of Manu Feijóo, an actor who was very famous in the late 90s and who wants to be a star again. To do so, he will try to reunite the actors of the series in which he triumphed for a reunion. The series is a dramedy that plays with reality and fiction, since the main characters play actors who worked in a series for teenagers in the 90s, something that many of them did: Manuel Feijóo (Compañeros, Tres son multitud), Julián González (Compañeros, Farmacia de guardia), Marta Solaz (Al salir de clase), Daniel Huarte (Al salir de clase), Lara de Miguel (Compañeros, Los mundos de Yupi), Rafael Reaño (Al salir de clase).
